replies.body: but the new one seems even more terrifying. Luckily we have homeground advantage on the Summoners Rift and part of saturday to bolster our forces!

> [{quoted}](name=Nightjar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HE4yrIsd,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-02-02T13:03:01.381+0000)
>
> but the new one seems even more terrifying. Luckily we have homeground advantage on the Summoners Rift and part of saturday to bolster our forces!

Just try to inform people they actually have to sign up as some people it appears don't know this. Ask people in game if they have enlisted or ask your friends if they wanna hop on for a few games.

I made a thread on leddit the other day that garnered some attention and a lot of posters didn't seem to even understand what the event was and hadn't signed up.

Right as I got into a game....

MONSTER DEFEATED!
Well last time it was like 1-2 mins left for over 1k hp so the chances are much better.
